import React from 'react' import { compose, lt, length, filter, propEq } from 'ramda' import './style.css' import './submit_button.css' import './form.css' import { Route, Link, BrowserRouter as Router } from 'react-router-dom' import Users from './users' import Contact from './contact' class App extends React.Component { state = { username: '', password: '' } login = (username, password) => { if (length(username) === 0 || length(password) === 0) return const valid_users = [ { username: 'sholom', password: 'jacks' }, { username: 'mendel', password: 'hacks' } ] if (this.is_valid(username, password)) { // alert(`Welcome ${username}`) window.location = 'users' } else { alert("The login is incorrect, you may not enter the land of padah") } } is_valid = (username, password) => compose( lt(0), length, filter(propEq('password', password)), filter(propEq('username', username)) )(this.valid_users) render() { return (

Sign In

) } } export default App;
